thread.title: Convicted Ex-Brazil President Won't Say If He Will Meet Surrender Deadline

author: Jeffrey T. Lewis
title: Convicted Ex-Brazil President Won't Say If He Will Meet Surrender Deadline
text:
SÃO PAULO— A lawyer for former Brazil President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, who was ordered to surrender to authorities on Friday to begin a prison term for corruption, told The Wall Street Journal that his client had not decided whether to turn himself in.
Cristiano Zanin Martins, the lawyer, said Friday morning he was still awaiting a decision on a habeas corpus petition filed Thursday night to keep Mr. da Silva out of jail. He also argued that the arrest order against the former president failed to respect legal procedures.
...
